window.location.reload(1);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Get Transactions" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Account');
var parentappModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentApplication');
var appRow1 = parentappModel.data[0]; 
console.log('Application Record'+appRow1);

console.log('appRow1.genesis__Account__c'+appRow1.genesis__Account__c);
console.log('appRow1.ID : : '+appRow1.Id);
console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
try{
var appRow = appModel.data[0]; 
    $.blockUI({
        message: 'Fetching Yodlee Transactions...',
        onBlock:function(){
            console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
            if(appRow1.Number_of_days__c===undefined || appRow1.Number_of_days__c===null) {
                appRow1.Number_of_days__c = -1;
            }
            var result = sforce.apex.execute('YodleeTransactionAPICallOut','getTransactions',
            {
                accId : appRow1.genesis__Account__c,
                appId : appRow1.Id,
                noOfDays : appRow1.Number_of_days__c,
            });
            console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
            var result1 = sforce.apex.execute('UpdateAccountInfo', 'getLastUpdate',
            {
                accountId : appRow1.genesis__Account__c
            });
            console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
            $.unblockUI();
            if(result.indexOf("Please contact your administrator")!=-1)
                alert ('Please check the yodlee user credentials');
            else
                alert(result); 
            //parentappModel.updateRows(appRow1);
            //parentappModel.commit();
            //parentappModel.save();
            window.location.reload();
        }
    });
}
catch(e){
    console.log('caught'+e);
}
//alert(applicationId);
//alert(result);
//console.log(result);

var parentappModel = skuid.model.getModel('ParentApplication');
var appRow1 = parentappModel.data[0]; 
console.log('Application Record'+appRow1);

console.log('appRow1.genesis__Account__c'+appRow1.genesis__Account__c);
console.log('appRow1.ID : : '+appRow1.Id);
console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
try{
var appRow = appModel.data[0]; 
    $.blockUI({
        message: 'Fetching Yodlee Transactions...',
        onBlock:function(){
            console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
            if(appRow1.Number_of_days__c===undefined || appRow1.Number_of_days__c===null) {
                appRow1.Number_of_days__c = -1;
            }
            var result = sforce.apex.execute('YodleeTransactionAPICallOut','getTransactions',
            {
                accId : appRow1.genesis__Account__c,
                appId : appRow1.Id,
                noOfDays : appRow1.Number_of_days__c,
            });
            console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
            var result1 = sforce.apex.execute('UpdateAccountInfo', 'getLastUpdate',
            {
                accountId : appRow1.genesis__Account__c
            });
            console.log('No of days : : '+appRow1.Number_of_days__c);
            $.unblockUI();
            if(result.indexOf("Please contact your administrator")!=-1)
                alert ('Please check the yodlee user credentials');
            else
                alert(result); 
            //parentappModel.updateRows(appRow1);
            //parentappModel.commit();
            //parentappModel.save();
            window.location.reload();
        }
    });
}
catch(e){
    console.log('caught'+e);
}

var accRow = appModels.data[0]; 
try{
    if(accRow.ShowRawXML === true){
        accModel.updateRow(accModel.getFirstRow(),
        {
            ShowRawXML : false
        });
        accModel.save();
        console.log('--ShowRawXML--False__'+accRow.ShowRawXML);
    }
    if(accRow.ShowRawXML ===false){
        accModel.updateRow(accModel.getFirstRow(),
        {
            ShowRawXML : true
        });
        accModel.save();
        console.log('--ShowRawXML--True__'+accRow.ShowRawXML);
    }
}
catch(e){
    console.log('caught'+e);
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="BureauSubsetDoc" cachelocation="false">

location="inlinesnippet" name="CallTalx" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var app = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationTalx');
var talx = skuid.model.getModel('Talx');


console.log(talx.data[0]);
var appData = app.data[0];
console.log('App id',appData);
alert('Talx API Calling');
var result = sforce.apex.execute('TalxIntegration','getRequestandResponse',
{
    appId: appData.Id
});

window.location.reload(1);</jsitem></javascript><css/><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2vkz-293"/></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles></skuidpage>

Name: ClonePage
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage showsidebar="true" showheader="true" tabtooverride="skuid__Page__c" unsavedchangeswarning="" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <labels/>
  <models>
    <model id="PageData" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" doclone="yes" datasourcetype="" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" value="Id" field="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="PageData">
      <maintitle>Clone {{Model.Label}}</maintitle>
      <subtitle>
        <template>{{Model.Label}}</template>
      </subtitle>
      <actions>
        <action type="savecancel" afterSave="/{{Id}}" afterCancel="/{{$Param.id}}" saveLabel="Create Cloned Page" window="self">
          <savehotkeys>
            <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
            <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
          </savehotkeys>
          <cancelhotkeys/>
          <renderconditions/>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </pagetitle>
    <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="PageData" mode="edit">
      <columns>
        <column width="100%">
          <sections>
            <section title="New Page Information">
              <fields>
                <field id="Name" required="true"/>
                <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
                <field id="OwnerId">
                  <label>Page Owner</label>
                  <filters/>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
      </columns>
    </basicfieldeditor>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

Name: CredentialsManagement
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false" personalizationmode="server">
  <models>
    <model id="cm_ModelDataSources" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">

      </conditions>

    <model id="cm_AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>

        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="oauth2" field="skuid__Auth_Method__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>

      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_ModelDataSourceCreds" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service_Credential__c" orderby="skuid__Service_Name__c" doclone="" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" datasource="salesforce" label="Data Source Credential" labelplural="Data Source Credentials">
      <fields>

        <field id="skuid__Applies_To__c" overridemetadata="true" required="true"/>

          </actions>

          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_OAuthCredentials" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider_Credential__c" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" limit="" orderby="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" label="OAuth Credential" labelplural="OAuth Credentials" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Expiration__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Issued__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token_Issued__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Times_Refresh_Token_Used__c"/>
        <field id="Auth_Provider_Name__ui" label="Auth Provider" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" returntype="TEXT" readonly="true">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("cm_AuthProviders","Name","Id",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="Auth_Provider_Oauth_Type__ui" label="Auth Provider Type" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" returntype="TEXT" readonly="true">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("cm_AuthProviders","skuid__Type__c","Id",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="action" label="Action" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" createable="true" editable="true" filterable="false" required="false" uionly="true"/>
        <field id="AccessToken__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Has Access Token" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Access_Token__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="RefreshToken__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Has Refresh Token" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Refresh_Token__c}})</formula>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.credentialsManagement.populateOAuthCredentials"/>
          </actions>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_EncryptionSettings" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__JobId__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-2ghgL6-74">
      <components>
        <pagetitle model="cm_ModelDataSources" uniqueid="sk-2giu9o-153">
          <maintitle>{{$Label.MyCredentials}}</maintitle>
          <actions>
            <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.save}}" icon="sk-icon-save" uniqueid="sk-G6r0y-266">
              <actions>
                <action type="blockUI" message="Saving Credentials..."/>
                <action type="save">
                  <models>
                    <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                    <model>cm_OAuthCredentials</model>
                  </models>

                    <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error saving your Data Source Credentials" timeout="3000"/>

                <action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
                  <models>
                    <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                    <model>cm_OAuthCredentials</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
                <action type="unblockUI"/>
              </actions>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <enableconditions logictype="custom" logic="(1 OR 2) AND 3">
                <condition fieldmodel="cm_ModelDataSourceCreds" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" operator="="/>
                <condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="cm_OAuthCredentials" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
                <condition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="cm_EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__JobId__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>

<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="Feedback" limit="10" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="skuid__Feedback__c" doclone="" orderby="CreatedDate DESC">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__Status__c"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__c"/>
        <field id="Date" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>FORMAT_DATE('MM d, yy',{{CreatedDate}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Is_Current__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="true">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="true" label="Current Page Versions"/>
            <entry value="false" label="Previous Page Versions"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Status__c" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__skuid__Status__c" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="CreatedDate" operator="gte" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" name="__autofilter__start__CreatedDate" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="CreatedDate" operator="lte" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" name="__autofilter__end__CreatedDate" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="skuid__Page__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" state="" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Type__c" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__skuid__Type__c" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__Is_Current__c" state="filterableon" inactive="false" name="PageVersionStatus" operator="="/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="FeedbackTotals" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="aggregate" sobject="skuid__Feedback__c" doclone="" processonclient="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" name="countName" function="COUNT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
      <groupby method="simple">
        <field id="skuid__Status__c" name="skuidStatusc"/>
      </groupby>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1_XL2y-94">
      <components>
        <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-1aeZxS-83" model="Feedback" cssclass="sk-fm-header">
          <maintitle>Feedback Manager</maintitle>
          <actions/>
          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
        </pagetitle>
        <panelset type="standard" uniqueid="sk-1zs3-R-90" scroll="variable" cssclass="sk-fm-content" offset="125px">
          <panels>
            <panel type="left" width="225px" cssclass="sk-fm-filters">
              <components>
                <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-30n9v2-168" model="pgs__NewPage" cssclass="sk-fm-filter-title">
                  <maintitle>Filter</maintitle>
                  <actions/>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                </pagetitle>
                <filterset model="Feedback" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" uniqueid="sk-25dVuK-312" emptysearchbehavior="query" layout="vertical" searchplaceholdertext="Keyword search">
                  <filters/>
                  <searchfields/>
                </filterset>
                <filterset model="Feedback" searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" uniqueid="sk-1_yGoP-328" layout="vertical" emptysearchbehavior="query" cssclass="sk-fm-filter-set">
                  <filters>
                    <filter type="select" filteroffoptionlabel="All Page Versions" createfilteroffoption="false" affectcookies="true" autocompthreshold="25" conditionsource="manual" labelmode="manual" condition="PageVersionStatus" label="Page Versions">
                      <sources>
                        <source type="manual" effectsbehavior="justdefault">
                          <options>
                            <option label="All Page Versions" type="complex">
                              <effects>
                                <effect action="deactivate" value="" condition="PageVersionStatus"/>

                            </option>

                            <option label="Previous Page Versions" type="simple" value="false"/>

                    </filter>
                    <filter type="select" filteroffoptionlabel="All Categories" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" autocompthreshold="25" conditionsource="auto" labelmode="manual" conditionfield="skuid__Type__c" label="Category"/>
                    <filter type="select" filteroffoptionlabel="All Status" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" autocompthreshold="25" conditionsource="auto" labelmode="auto" conditionfield="skuid__Status__c"/>
                    <filter type="daterange" filteroffoptionlabel="All" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" autocompthreshold="25" conditionsource="auto" labelmode="manual" conditionfield="CreatedDate" label="Date range"/>
                  </filters>

            <panel>

                </includepanel>

            </panel>
            <panel type="left" width="320px">
              <components>
                <queue model="Feedback" tagrendertype="snippet" searchbox="false" tokenizesearch="true" showsearchbydefault="false" uniqueid="sk-1_UcLS-134" instantfilters="false" searchmethod="server" cssclass="sk-fm-response-list" rendersnippet="renderQueueItem" itemicon="">
                  <interactions>

Name: NewPage

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="pgs__mobilepage" sobject="skuid__Page__c" query="false" limit="1" datasourcetype="" type="" doclone="">
      <fields>

      <conditions logic="">

      <actions/>

  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-34TxSj-106">
      <components>
        <wizard deferstepcontentsrendering="true" buttonslocation="bottom" uniqueid="sk-10set8-247">
          <steps>
            <step stepid="step0" steplabel="Step 1: Name your page">
              <components>

                  <columns layoutmode="responsive" columngutter="4px" rowgutter="4px">
                    <column behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Page setup" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="Name" required="true"/>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions/>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>
                  </columns>
                  <conditions/>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-245"  type="multi" stepid="step1" label="Next Step" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="requeryModel" model="pgs__mobilepage" behavior="standard"/>
                    <action type="navigateToStep" stepid="step1"  window="self"/>
                  </actions>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and" message="Please enter a Name for this Page.">
                    <condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Name" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                  </enableconditions>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
            <step stepid="step1" steplabel="Step 2: Pick your starting point">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="pgs__NewPage" mode="edit" uniqueid="NewPageEditor" layout="above" buttonposition="" showerrorsinline="true">
                  <columns layoutmode="responsive" columngutter="4px" rowgutter="4px">
                    <column behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Page setup" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__Initial_State__c" type="CUSTOM" required="true" addnoneoption="false" valuehalign="" cssclass="" snippet="skuid.core.snippets.newPageStartingPoint">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field id="skuid__Type__c" required="true" type="RADIO_BUTTONS" valuehalign="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__mobilepage" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="none"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                              <label>Page Type</label>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions/>
                        </section>
                        <section title="Use a Master Page" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true" optionsource="">

                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="masterpage"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                              <filters>
                                <filter type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" value="true"/>
                              </filters>

                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="masterpage"/>
                          </renderconditions>
                        </section>

                    </column>
                  </columns>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action type="navigate" label="Previous Step" stepid="step0" window="self" icon="sk-icon-arrow-left">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>

                  <hotkeys/>

                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-244" type="navigate" stepid="step2_enterPageXML" label="Paste XML" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right" window="self">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="from-xml"/>
                  </renderconditions>
                  <enableconditions/>
                </action>
                <action type="navigate" label="Select Page Template" stepid="step2_selectTemplate" window="self" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template"/>
                  </renderconditions>
                  <enableconditions/>
                </action>
                <action type="save" label="Create Page" stepid="" window="self" icon="sk-icon-save" url="/{{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                    <rendercondition type="multiple" operator="in" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
                      <values>
                        <value>none</value>
                        <value>masterpage</value>
                      </values>
                    </rendercondition>
                  </renderconditions>
                  <enableconditions/>
                  <models>
                    <model>pgs__NewPage</model>
                  </models>
                  <hotkeys>
                    <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                  </hotkeys>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
            <step stepid="step2_enterPageXML" steplabel="Step 3: Paste XML from pre-built Page">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="pgs__NewPage" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-10tlgt-331" mode="edit" layout="above">
                  <columns>
                    <column width="100%">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Paste in XML from prebuilt page" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__Page_XML__c" required="true" valuehalign="" type="" displayrows="11">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="from-xml" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field type="COMBO" allowhtml="true" readonly="true" valuehalign="">
                              <label><a class="field-label-link" href="https://github.com/skuid/SamplePages" target="blank"><div class="nx-editor ui-widget ui-button ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button-text-icon-primary" role="button" style="margin-right: 4px;"><span class="ui-button-icon-primary ui-icon sk-icon-popup sk-icon inline"></span><span class="ui-button-text">Find Sample Pages</span></div></a></label>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="from-xml"/>
                          </renderconditions>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>
                  </columns>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-245" type="navigate" stepid="step1" label="Previous Step" icon="sk-icon-arrow-left" window="self"/>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-246" type="save" label="Create Page" icon="sk-icon-save" window="self" url="/{{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}">
                  <hotkeys>
                    <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                  </hotkeys>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and" message="You must enter valid XML from a sample page to proceed.">
                    <condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Page_XML__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                  </enableconditions>
                  <models>
                    <model>pgs__NewPage</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
            <step stepid="step2_selectTemplate" steplabel="Step 3: Select Page Template">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="pgs__NewPage" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-10tpT_-360" mode="edit">
                  <columns>
                    <column width="100%">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Select Page Template" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__Page_Template__c" type="RADIO_BUTTONS" required="true" addnoneoption="false" valuehalign="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <label>Template</label>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue"/>
                          </renderconditions>
                        </section>
                        <section title="Data Source" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__DataSourceType__ui" valuehalign="" type="CUSTOM" snippet="skuid.core.renderers.dataSourceType" required="true">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="snippet" sourcesnippet="skuid.core.haveMultipleActiveDataSources"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>

                            <field id="skuid__DataSource__ui" valuehalign="" type="CUSTOM" snippet="skuid.core.renderers.dataSource" required="true">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="snippet" sourcesnippet="skuid.core.haveMultipleActiveDataSources"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field id="skuid__Primary_Object__c" type="CUSTOM" snippet="PrimaryObjectField" required="true" valuehalign="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>

                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>

                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-246" type="save" label="Create Page" icon="sk-icon-save" window="self" url="/{{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}">

                  </enableconditions>

  <components/>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="UtilSnippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var titles = $('.nx-pagebuilder-title-main'); 
	    // Theres a weird bug where if you're editing the pagebuilder
	    // with the pagebuilder, 2 titles will appear. So we just remove
	    // the second one
	    /*
		if(titles[1]){
		    titles[1].remove();
		}
		*/
		titles.prependTo('.nx-pagebuilder-toolbar-wrapper');
	});
	
	//  Set the new Child Page XML
	skuid.snippet.register('skuid.pagebuilder.setChildPageXML',function(config){
        var model = config.model,
            row = config.row,
            pageXML = '<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes">' +
            	'<models/>' +
            	'<pageregioncontents/>' +
            	'<components/>' + // Shouldn't be needed, but...
            	'<resources>' +
            		'<labels/>' +
            		'<css/>' +
            		'<javascript/>' +
            	'</resources>' +
            	'</skuidpage>';
        
        skuid.utils.writeXmlToPageLayoutFields(pageXML,model,row);
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="pageCollaboration" cachelocation="false">.interaction-container {
    margin-top: 3px;
    float: right;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.interaction-container.hibernating {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar {
    display: none;
    position: relative;
    margin-left: 3px;
}

.interaction-avatar IMG {
    background-color: white;
    height: 25px;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerOpened IMG {
    border: solid 1px #212324;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges IMG {
    border: solid 1px red;
}

.interaction-avatar.stale IMG {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: none;
    /* Prevent the warning icon from grabbing the focus and preventing the tooltip from showing */
    pointer-events: none;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	color: red;
	text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px black;
}</cssitem>

}

.message-container > .nx-messages:empty {

}</cssitem>

    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="AceEditor" url="" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid" filepath="ace.js"/>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="PageXMLEditor">(function(skuid){
var $ = skuid.$;
skuid.componentType.register('pageXMLEditor',function(element) {

	var model = skuid.$M('page'),
	    row = model.getFirstRow(),
	    editor = new skuid.ui.Editor(element),
        xmleditor = null,
        bc = skuid.builder.core,
        pauselistening = false;

	if (model) {
		// Register that we will be editing our model.
		// This will take care of adding Save and Cancel buttons to our header.
		// However, we will hide these unless they are explicitly added in the 'actions' area.
		editor.registerModel(model);
	}
	
    function getPageLayout() {
        return model.getFieldValues(row,bc.getLayoutFields(),true).join('');
    }

	// Extend our editor's native handleCancel method
	// so that we can rerender ourself
	editor.handleCancel = function() {
		// Run the prototype method
		//skuid.ui.Editor.prototype.handleCancel.call(editor);
        
		viewBuilderLink.removeClass('disabled');
		if (xmleditor) {
			pauselistening = true;
			xmleditor.setValue(formatXml(getPageLayout()));
			xmleditor.getSession().getSelection().clearSelection();
			pauselistening = false;
		}
	};
	
	editor.handleSave = function() {
		// Run the prototype method
		//skuid.ui.Editor.prototype.handleSave.call(editor);
		viewBuilderLink.removeClass('disabled');
	};
	
	editor.handleChange = function() {
		// Run the prototype method
		//skuid.ui.Editor.prototype.handleChange.call(editor);
		viewBuilderLink.addClass('disabled');
	};
	
	function formatXml(xml) {
		var formatted = '';
		var reg = /(>)(<)(\/*)/g;
		xml = xml.replace(reg, '$1\r\n$2$3');
		var pad = 0;
		jQuery.each(xml.split('\r\n'), function(index, node) {
			var indent = 0;
			if (node.match( /.+<\/\w[^>]*>$/ )) {
				indent = 0;
			} else if (node.match( /^<\/\w/ )) {
				if (pad !== 0) {
					pad -= 1;
				}
			} else if (node.match( /^<\w[^>]*[^\/]>.*$/ )) {
				indent = 1;
			} else {
				indent = 0;
			}
	
			var padding = '';
			for (var i = 0; i < pad; i++) {
				padding += '    ';
			}
	
			formatted += padding + node + '\r\n';
			pad += indent;
		});
	
		return formatted;
	}
	
	
	function condenseXml(xml) {
		return xml.replace(/(>)(\s*)(<)(\/*)/g,'$1$3$4');
	}

	var wrapper = jQuery('<div id="wrapper">');
	var textarea = jQuery('<div id="pagexmleditorbox">').addClass('nx-code-editor');
	var invalid = jQuery('<div>Invalid XML</div>').addClass('nx-error').css({'position':'absolute','top':'4px','right':'4px'}).hide();
	var viewBuilderLink = jQuery('<a>').addClass('nx-pagebuilder-viewxmllink').prop('href','/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id=' + row.Id).text('View/Edit in Page Builder');
	wrapper.append(textarea);
	element.append(wrapper,viewBuilderLink,invalid);
	function resize() {
		var height = ((window.innerHeight - $('.sk-headerwrapper').outerHeight() - 100)) + 'px';
		wrapper.css('height', height);
		textarea.css('height', height);
		element.css('position', 'relative').css('height', height);
		xmleditor.resize();
	}
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function() {
	    var height = ((window.innerHeight - $('.sk-headerwrapper').outerHeight() -120) * 0.85) + 'px';
	    wrapper.css('height',height);
	    textarea.css('height',height);
	    element.css('position','relative').css('height',height);

    	xmleditor = window.ace.edit('pagexmleditorbox');
    	xmleditor.getSession().setMode("ace/mode/xml");
    	xmleditor.setValue(formatXml(getPageLayout()));
    	xmleditor.getSession().getSelection().clearSelection();
    	textarea.show();
    	xmleditor.getSession().on('change',function() {
    		if (!pauselistening) {
    			var xmldoc;
    			try {
    				xmldoc = skuid.utils.makeXMLDoc(condenseXml(xmleditor.getValue()));
    				
    			}
    			catch(e) {
    				invalid.show();
    				return;
    			}
    			invalid.hide();
    			bc.save(xmldoc[0],model,row);
    		}
    	});
        resize();
    });
    $(window).resize(resize);

});
})(skuid);
</jsitem>

Name: Settings_AuthProviderDetail
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false" title="{{#$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}Auth Provider - {{{$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}}{{/$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}{{^$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}New Auth Provider{{/$Model.stng__AuthProviders.data.0.Name}}">
  <models>
    <model id="stng__AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Secret__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
        <field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="AuthProviderTypesPicklist"/>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__User_Info_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="explicit" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry label="Authorization Code" value="explicit"/>
            <entry label="Client Credentials" value="client_credentials"/>
            <entry label="Implicit" value="implicit"/>
            <entry label="Resource Owner Password Credentials" value="password"/>
            <entry label="SAML 2.0 Bearer Assertion" value="saml2-bearer"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Method__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="oauth2">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="apex" label="Custom Apex Authentication"/>
            <entry value="oauth2" label="OAuth 2.0 / OpenID"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_CompanyName" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Company Name"/>
        <field id="SP_SiteCollection" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Site Collection Path"/>
        <field id="SP_AuthUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Auth URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".sharepoint.com"+{{{SP_SiteCollection}}}+"/_layouts/15/OauthAuthorize.aspx"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_TokenUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Token URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net/"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".onmicrosoft.com/tokens/OAuth/2"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthMethodType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Auth Method Type" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="apex","apex",
IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth2","oauth","other"))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Token Req Body Params" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}==='sharepointonline','{"resource":"00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.sharepoint.com@'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.onmicrosoft.com"}','')</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Default Scopes Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(
   (CONTAINS({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}},'oauth')&&({{skuid__Type__c}}=='salesforce')),
   IF({{skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c}}=='explicit',
      'full,refresh_token','api'
   ),
   ''
)
</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Assertion_Signing_Certificate__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Request_Headers__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{}"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Secret__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Auth_Method__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_AuthUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_AuthUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Default_Scopes__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.onAuthProviderTypeChange"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>

<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false">

                  </columns>

                  <fields>
                    <field id="Name" readonly="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true" allowordering="true" uniqueid="sk-3UuBgx-322"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-3UuBgy-324"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-3UuBgz-326"/>

                      <label>Pages available in</label>
                    </field>
                    <field id="skuid__Load_Order__c" decimalplaces="" valuehalign="" type="" allowordering="true" uniqueid="sk-3UuBh4-330"/>
                    <field id="skuid__Active__c" type="" valuehalign="" uniqueid="sk-3UuBh6-332"/>
                  </fields>
                  <rowactions>
                    <action type="edit"/>
                    <action type="delete">
                      <renderconditions logictype="and">
                        <rendercondition type="multiple" operator="not in" field="Name" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__ComponentPacks" sourcetype="fieldvalue">
                          <values>
                            <value>skuidcore</value>
                            <value>skuidmobilecore</value>
                            <value>skuidvis</value>
                            <value>skuid</value>
                            <value>skuidbuilder</value>
                          </values>
                        </rendercondition>
                      </renderconditions>
                    </action>
                    <action type="drawer" label="Additional Properties" icon="sk-icon-config" openicon="sk-icon-escalate">
                      <drawer title="Drawer Area" closehandle="true">
                        <components>
                          <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="stng__ComponentPacks" buttonposition="" mode="edit" layout="">

                                  <section title="Runtime/Builder Definition File Locations within component pack" collapsible="no">
                                    <fields>
                                      <field id="skuid__Runtime_Definition_File__c"/>
                                      <field id="skuid__Builder_Definition_File__c"/>
                                    </fields>
                                  </section>
                                </sections>
                              </column>
                            </columns>
                          </basicfieldeditor>
                        </components>
                      </drawer>
                    </action>
                  </rowactions>
                  <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                  <views>
                    <view type="standard"/>
                  </views>
                  <actions defaultlabel="Global Actions" defaulticon="sk-icon-magic" usefirstitemasdefault="true">
                    <action type="multi" label="New Component Pack" icon="sk-icon-add">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="createRow" model="stng__ComponentPacks" appendorprepend="append" defaultmodefornewitems="edit">
                          <defaults>
                            <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Active__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="true"/>
                            <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="Any"/>
                          </defaults>
                        </action>
                        <action type="showPopup">
                          <popup title="Create new Component Pack" width="70%">
                            <components>
                              <pagetitle model="stng__ComponentPacks">
                                <maintitle>Create new Component Pack</maintitle>
                                <actions>
                                  <action type="multi" label="Cancel" icon="sk-icon-cancel">
                                    <actions>
                                      <action type="cancel">
                                        <models>
                                          <model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
                                        </models>
                                      </action>
                                      <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                    </actions>
                                  </action>
                                  <action type="multi" label="Finish and Save" icon="sk-icon-save">
                                    <actions>
                                      <action type="blockUI" message="Creating new Component Pack..."/>
                                      <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newComponentPackPreSave">
                                        <onerroractions>
                                          <action type="blockUI" message="Unable to create Component Pack - there was a problem creating the Component Pack Static Resource ZIP file." timeout="1500"/>
                                        </onerroractions>
                                      </action>
                                      <action type="save">
                                        <models>
                                          <model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
                                        </models>
                                        <onerroractions>
                                          <action type="blockUI" message="Unable to create Component Pack." timeout="1500"/>
                                        </onerroractions>
                                      </action>
                                      <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                      <action type="blockUI" message="Save successful! New Component Pack created." timeout="1500"/>
                                    </actions>
                                  </action>
                                </actions>
                                <conditions>
                                  <condition type="contextrow" field="Id" mergefield="Id"/>
                                </conditions>
                              </pagetitle>
                              <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="stng__ComponentPacks" buttonposition="" mode="edit" layout="">
                                <columns>
                                  <column width="100%">
                                    <sections>
                                      <section title="Choose a unique Prefix for Components in your Pack, e.g. "acmevisualizations"" collapsible="no">
                                        <fields>
                                          <field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" required="true">

                                      </section>

                                        <fields>
                                          <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c" valuehalign="" type="">

                                      <section title="Which Skuid environments should this Component Pack be available in?" collapsible="no">

                                        </fields>
                                      </section>
                                      <section title="(Required ONLY if you are working in a Managed Package development org)" collapsible="no">
                                        <fields>
                                          <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" valuehalign="" type="">

                                          </field>
                                        </fields>
                                      </section>
                                    </sections>
                                  </column>
                                </columns>
                                <conditions>

                                </conditions>
                              </basicfieldeditor>
                            </components>
                          </popup>
                        </action>
                        <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.loadJSZip"/>
                      </actions>
                      <drawer title="Drawer Area" width="90%" closehandle="true">
                        <components/>

                    </action>
                  </actions>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">

            <entry value="separateurl" label="Separate Authentication URL"/>
            <entry value="provider" label="Authentication Provider (OAuth, Custom, etc)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Authentication_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Host" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Port__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" required="true" label="Data Service" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" picklistmodel="stng__DataServices" entryvalue="{{{Id}}}" entrylabel="{{{Name}}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Cache_Time_Stamp__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Password__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org-wide Default Password"/>
        <field id="skuid__Username__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org-wide Default Username"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Body__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Body_Content_Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Permission_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Config__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_URL_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Credential_Source__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="none" helptext="The level of specificity at which Usernames and Passwords can be stored. "Per User..." allows each user to enter their own username/password for this Data Source via the "My Credentials" UI, with Profile-level and Org-Wide credentials as optional cascading defaults. If "Shared: Per Profile" is used, then all users of a profile will share their profile's credentials, with Org-Wide credentials, if defined, being used as a default if no credentials are defined for that profile.">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="none" label="None"/>
            <entry value="org" label="Shared: Org-Wide"/>
            <entry value="profile" label="Shared: Per-Profile, with optional Org-wide Default"/>
            <entry value="user" label="Per-User, with optional Profile / Org-wide Defaults"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="AuthProviderMethod__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" label="Authentication Provider Method">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__AuthProviders","skuid__Auth_Method__c","Name",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="ShowCredentialSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Show Credential Source" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="none",false,
IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="provider" && ({{AuthProviderMethod__ui}}==="oauth1" || ({{AuthProviderMethod__ui}}==="oauth2" && {{AuthProviderGrantType}} !== "password")),false,IF({{skuid__Authentication__c}}==="saml",false,true)))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="IsSQLDataSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>CONTAINS_ANY({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}},"PostgreSQL","MicrosoftSQL","MySQL","OracleDB","SQLite3","AmazonRedshift")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="CustomDataService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use Custom Data Service" defaultValue=""/>
        <field id="ShowUNPW__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Show Username/Password" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>(({{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="org" || {{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="profile" || {{skuid__Credential_Source__c}}==="user")) && {{ShowCredentialSource__ui}}</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthProviderGrantType" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" label="Authentication Provider Grant Type">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__AuthProviders","skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c","Name",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="StoredCredCount__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Stored Credentials Count" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" precision="17" scale="0">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__CredCounts","countId","ServiceName",{{{Name}}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Request_Verb__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="POST">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="GET" label="GET"/>
            <entry value="POST" label="POST"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SFMyDomainURL__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="URL" label="Salesforce My Domain URL" defaultValue="" helptext="The API URL for your Salesforce org, e.g. "https://acme-widgets.my.salesforce.com"/>
        <field id="SFAuthMethod__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Authentication Method" defaultValue="provider">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="provider" label="Authentication Provider (OAuth 2.0)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="IsSalesforceService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>{{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}}=='salesforce'</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SFMyDomain__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="My Domain" defaultValue="" helptext="To connect to Salesforce orgs with Skuid, these orgs must use My Domain. To configure your org for My Domain, go to /domainname/DomainName.apexp?setupid=OrgDomain"/>
        <field id="ShowDataSourceTypeSelectionStep" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Name_Identifier_Field__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="federation_id" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="--" label="User Fields" disabled="true"/>
            <entry value="email" label="Email"/>
            <entry value="federation_id" label="Federation Identifier"/>
            <entry value="username" label="Username"/>
            <entry value="--" label="" disabled="true"/>
            <entry value="--" label="Custom" disabled="true"/>
            <entry value="::formula" label="Result of Formula"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Name_Identifier_Formula__c"/>
        <field id="ODataVersion__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" required="true" label="OData Version">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="1.0" label="1.0"/>
            <entry value="2.0" label="2.0"/>
            <entry value="3.0" label="3.0"/>
            <entry value="4.0" label="4.0"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="ODataSupportsBatch__ui" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Supports Batch Operations" uionly="true"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__ModelDataSources" field="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Authentication__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
              <models>
                <model>stng__ClearCredsJob</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
          </events>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.changeModelDataSourceWithCreds"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__ModelDataSources" field="skuid__URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SFMyDomainURL__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SFMyDomainURL__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__ModelDataSources" field="skuid__Authentication__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SFAuthMethod__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SFAuthMethod__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__ModelDataSources" field="SFMyDomainURL__ui" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="https://{{{SFMyDomain__ui}}}.my.salesforce.com"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SFMyDomain__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__ModelDataSources" affectedrows="context" field="skuid__Custom_Config__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{"odata-version":"{{ODataVersion__ui}}","supports-batch":"{{{ODataSupportsBatch__ui}}}"}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>ODataVersion__ui</field>
            <field>ODataSupportsBatch__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Secret__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
        <field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="AuthProviderTypesPicklist"/>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__User_Info_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="explicit" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry label="Authorization Code" value="explicit"/>
            <entry label="Client Credentials" value="client_credentials"/>
            <entry label="Implicit" value="implicit"/>
            <entry label="Resource Owner Password Credentials" value="password"/>
            <entry label="SAML 2.0 Bearer Assertion" value="saml2-bearer"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Method__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="oauth2">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="apex" label="Custom Apex Authentication"/>
            <entry value="oauth2" label="OAuth 2.0 / OpenID"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_CompanyName" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Company Name"/>
        <field id="SP_SiteCollection" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Site Collection Path"/>
        <field id="SP_AuthUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Auth URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".sharepoint.com"+{{{SP_SiteCollection}}}+"/_layouts/15/OauthAuthorize.aspx"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="SP_TokenUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Token URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>"https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net/"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".onmicrosoft.com/tokens/OAuth/2"</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="NewSFAuthProvider_AuthUrl__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="New SF Auth Provider Auth Url" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}=="salesforce",{{{$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.skuid__URL__c}}} + "/services/oauth2/authorize","")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="NewSFAuthProvider_TokenUrl__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="New SF Auth Provider Token Url" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}=="salesforce",{{{$Model.stng__ModelDataSources.data.0.skuid__URL__c}}} + "/services/oauth2/token","")</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
        <field id="AuthMethodType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Auth Method Type" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="apex","apex",
IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth2","oauth","other"))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
        <field id="SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Token Req Body Params" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}==='sharepointonline','{"resource":"00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.sharepoint.com@'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.onmicrosoft.com"}','')</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Default Scopes Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(
   (CONTAINS({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}},'oauth')&&({{skuid__Type__c}}=='salesforce')),
   IF({{skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c}}=='explicit',
      'full,refresh_token','api'
   ),
   ''
)
</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Assertion_Signing_Certificate__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Type__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="stng__AuthProviderType"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Auth_Method__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="stng__AuthProviderMethod"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Request_Headers__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{}"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Client_Secret__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Auth_Method__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_AuthUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_AuthUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenUrlFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenUrlFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProviders" field="skuid__Default_Scopes__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui}}}"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.onAuthProviderTypeChange"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>

    <jsitem location="staticresource" name="SkuidSettingsJS" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="skuid"></jsitem>
